name: Aerie
description:
Aerie is a game of flight and nest building. Take to the skies to fly, find, and collect a variety of materials to build and decorate your nest. Explore the island to find new flowers, mushrooms, and other shiny treasures.

For performance and graphical reasons, downloading is HIGHLY recommended.

- Controls -

Standard Controls

[Escape] Pause game

[WASD] Steer/Move

[Left Shift] Accelerate/Take off

[Spacebar] Brake/Land

First Person Controls

[Middle Mouse Click] Enter first person

[Left Click] Pick up

[Right Click] Preview item placement

[Right Click + Left Click] Place item

[Right Click + E/R] Rotate Horizontally

[Right Click + Tab/Q] Rotate Vertically
